title: An overview of the recent advances and future prospects of three-dimensional particle electrode systems for treating wastewater
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,27712-27732

This review presents a thorough analysis of the research and future development of particle electrodes used for catalyzing pollutants in electrochemical systems.
